PRODUCT.DETAILS: 3 x 240V Pure Sine Wave AC (2000W), 2 x USB-C PD (100W), 2 x USB QC (18W), 2 x USB (2.4A), 1 x 12V Cigarette Socket, 1 x XT60 (12V/25A)
240V AC mains, 12V 10A car socket, max 500W Solar(requires unregulated input).
Powers fridges (approx 3-4 days), laptops, speakers, microwaves, coffee machines, CPAP devices, etc.
Pass-through charging, 6-month charge retention, informative LCD display, UPS functionality
